document_data.mainbody:
mulets of Corellon were enchanted amulets used by clerics of Corellon Larethian in the late 15 century DR.
Amulets of Corellon were small silver crescents on a blue string.
These crescent amulets were imbued with divine magics that allowed its wearer to cast protection from evil on themselves and three allies. These items could be used exclusively by clerics of Corellon.
*Halbenet Soladonel a moon elf cleric of Corellon Larethian who worked with other warriors of Waterdeep, performing missions on behalf of Laeral Silverhand in the late 15 century DR.
